name: San Francisco SPCA - Community Clinic
description: Affordable preventative care, including vaccines, parasite protection, and treatment for minor conditions
fullDescription: The SF SPCA's Community Clinic provides affordable preventative care to help all San Francisco pets stay healthy.
whatTheyOffer:
- Affordable wellness exams
- Vaccinations at reduced prices
- Parasite prevention (flea, tick, heartworm)
- Treatment for minor conditions
- Microchipping services
howToGetIt:
1. Call or book online for an appointment
2. Income verification not required but discounts available
3. Bring your pet to the clinic at scheduled time
4. Pay affordable fees at time of service
keywords: SF SPCA, San Francisco SPCA, Community Clinic, wellness exam, vaccinations, flea, tick, heartworm, microchip, affordable vet
